Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 nee Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kattalaiyittu Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Kaanaandhesam Adhin Ellaigal Utpada Ungalukku Sudhandharamaagak Kidaikkappogiradhu; Neengal Kaanaandhesaththil Serumbodhu,
3 ungal Thenpuram Seenvanaandharamthodangi Edhom Dhesaththin Oramattum Irukkum; Kizhakke Irukkira Uppukkadalin Kadaisi Thodangi Ungal Then Ellaiyaayirukkum.
4 ungal Ellai Therkilirundhu Akkaraapeem Medugalai Sutri, Seenvanaandharamvaraiyil Poi, Therkile Kaadhesparneyaavukkum, Angeyirundhu Aadhsaar Adhaarukkum, Angeyirundhu Asmonaavukkum Poi,
5 asmonaavilirundhu Egipthin Nadhivaraikkum Sutrippoik Kadalil Mudiyum.
6 metrisaikkup Perunkadale Ungalukku Ellai; Adhuve Ungalukku Merpuraththu Ellaiyaayirukkum.
7 ungalukku Vadathisai Ellai Perunkadal Thodangi, Or Ennum Malaiyai Ungalukkuk Kurippaaga Vaiththu,
8 or Ennum Malai Thodangi, Aamaaththirkup Pogira Vazhiyaik Kurippaagavaiththu, Angeyirundhu Andha Ellai Sedhaaththirkup Poi,
9 angeyirundhu Adhu Sipronukkuppoi, Aadhsaar Enaanile Mudiyum; Adhuve Ungalukku Vadapuraththu Ellaiyaayirukkum.
10 ungalukkuk Keezhththisai Ellaikku Aadhsaar Enaanilirundhu Seppaamaik Kurippaaga Vaiththu,
11 seppaamilirundhu Ellaiyaanadhu Aayinukkuk Kizhakkilulla Riplaapariyandhamum, Angeyirundhu Kinnaredh Kadalpariyandhamum Adhin Keezhkkaraiyoramaai,
12 angeyirundhu Yordhaanpariyandhamum Poi, Uppukkadalil Mudiyum; Indha Sutrellaigalaiyudaiya Dhesame Ungalukkuriya Dhesam Endru Sol Endraar.
13 appozhudhu Mose Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Onbadharaik Koththiraththaarukkuk Kodukkumpadi Karththar Kattalaiyittadhum, Neengal Seettuppottu Sudhandhariththukkollavendiyadhumaana Dhesam Idhuve.

14 rooban Puththirar Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththinpadiyum, Kaadh Puththirar Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Vamsaththinpadiyum, Thangal Sudhandharaththaip Petrukkondadhum Allaamal, Manaaseyin Paadhik Koththiraththaarum Thangal Sudhandharaththaip Petrukkondaargal.
15 indha Irandaraik Koththiraththaarum Sooriyodhaya Thisaiyaagiya Kizhakke Erigovin Arugeyulla Yordhaanukku Ippuraththile Thangal Sudhandharaththaip Petrukkondaargal Endraan.
16 melum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
17 ungalukku Dhesaththaip Pangittukkodukkum Manidharin Naamangalaavana: Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum, Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavume.
18 andriyum, Dhesaththaip Pangidumpadi Ovvoru Koththiraththil Ovvoru Thalaivanaiyum Therindhukollungal.
19 andha Manidharudaiya Naamangalaavana: Yoodhaa Koththiraththukku Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalepum,
20 simiyon Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Ammiyoodhin Kumaaranaagiya Saamuvelum,
21 benyameen Koththiraththukkuk Kislonin Kumaaranaagiya Elidhaadhum,
22 thaan Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Yokliyin Kumaaranaagiya Pukki Ennum Prabuvum,
23 yoseppin Kumaaranaagiya Manaase Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Epodhin Kumaaranaagiya Anniyel Ennum Prabuvum,
24 eppraayeem Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Sipdhaanin Kumaaranaagiya Kemuvel Ennum Prabuvum,
25 sepulon Puththirarin Koththiraththukkup Parnaakin Kumaaranaagiya Elisaappaan Ennum Prabuvum,
26 isakkaar Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Aasaanin Kumaaranaagiya Palththiyel Ennum Prabuvum,
27 aaser Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Selomiyin Kumaaranaagiya Akiyooththennum Prabuvum,
28 napthali Puththirarin Koththiraththukku Ammiyoodhin Kumaaranaagiya Pedhaakkel Ennum Prabuvume Endraar.
29 kaanaandhesaththile Isravel Puththirarukku Sudhandharangalaip Pangittuk Kodukkiradharkuk Karththar Kattalaiyittavargal Ivargale.
